allExperience.companyDescription: i started my journey of learning REACT JS from Ally Soft Solutions, i was intern there and was learning new things daily and daily it was almost become an part of my life, i have learned every basic concepts of React JS there in the guide of the professional expert, it was fun time learning new things and i had really fun there.

i was solo intern there, as there were no senior web developer. when i was there i had started making big softwares like CRM to handle and manage things, as i was solo intern i had got so many of error's and so i know how to solve error's. and i also started to learn backend there.
